text:
Message 1166 of 4024
Thank you.
I have been receiving tax statements, some addressed to you like msft w2. Do you want me to keep them, to prepare tax return? I have not opened
them.
We will likely owe because of stock sales as usual . If yes I do tax return I’ll target some time in March.
Sent:02/07/2024 at 07:56 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/07/2024 at 08:32 AM)
Subject:Re: Support for the Family
Message 1167 of 4024
Hey- You're super busy so let me do the sausage-making to make this super simple, teammate! Below are the issues that will cost us a fortune and not
be resolved till spring if we don't step in. It is long but is all-inclusive, so please take a moment to digest. Ready to move when you are.
I) Confirmation of Issues:
- You filed a court doc that says I am "a credible threat to the family's physical safety". We agree that I'm not beating you, or our boys
- Your suggestion was: "Let Lisa know and respond accordingly requesting to remove. I’ll connect with Anna Lisa on that box checked."
II) Temporary Restraining Order:
- An update was filed with no material improvements- still no running list, 1-1 sausage-making emails, emergency/urgent calls or texts.
- Your suggestion was: "Can you propose something that you feel is more appropriate? I’m concerned... but open to your suggestion."
--------------------------------------Suggested eMail from Lisa to Anna Lisa--------------------------------------
Hi Anna Lisa- intro and niceties..
After some follow-up discussions between Ms Moyer and Mr Moyer, they have arrived at the following mutually agreeable modifications to the
Confirmation of Issues filing and the Temporary Restraining order to better meet their needs at this time. They both appreciate the mutual
teamwork and goodwill in a difficult time.
I) Confirmation of Issues: They both agree on the following updates to the court filing
- They would like to change Adrian Rex Moyer's age from 9 years old as noted, to 11 years old.
- Ms Moyer agrees Mr Moyer is not presently a credible threat to the family's physical safety
II) Temporary Restraining Order: They would like the following accommodations to the plan filed
- Our Family Wizard: The Restrained Person will communicate with the Protected Person solely to co-parent the parties’ children and/or to
Sent:02/07/2024 at 08:31 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/07/2024 at 08:39 AM)
Subject:Lisa Email to Anna Lisa
